question: Which of the following is the correct identifier ?
Which of the following is the address operator ?
Which of the following features must be supported by any programming language to become a pure object-oriented programming language ?
The programming language that has the ability to create new data types is called___.
Which of the following is the correct syntax to read the single character to console in the C++ language ?
Which of the following statements is correct about the formal parameters in C++ ?
option1: Parameters with which functions are called
option2: Parameters which are used in the definition of the function
option3: Variables other than passed parameters in a function
option4: Variables that are never used in the function
answer: Parameters with which functions are called

question: The C++ language is ______ object-oriented language.
Which of the following comment syntax is correct to create a single-line comment in the C++ program ?
C++ is a ___ type of language.
Which of the following refers to characteristics of an array ?
option1: An array is a set of similar data items
option2: An array is a set of distinct data items
option3: An array can hold different types of datatypes
answer: An array is a set of similar data items
